import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Container, Row, Col, } from "reactstrap"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; // core components import UserHeader from "components/Headers/UserHeader.js"; // let userinfo= ""; const Profile = () => { const [users,setUser]=useState([]) const token = localStorage.getItem("user-info"); const userid = localStorage.getItem("userid") useEffect(()=>{ fetchComments() },[]) const fetchComments =()=>{ fetch(`http://api-select.jetzyapp.com:4000/api/v1.0/user-profile/${userid}`,{ headers: {"Authorization" : `Bearer ${token}` }}).then((result)=>{ result.json().then((resp)=>{ console.log(resp) setUser(resp.ResponseData) }) }) } console.log(res) return ( <> {/* Page content */}
